Label: Agency
Description: Federal Agency as identified in EPA Facility Registry Service

Label: Agriculture
Description: U.S. Department of Agriculture - manages programs related to farming, forestry, and food safety

Label: Commerce
Description: U.S. Department of Commerce - oversees business and trade-related environmental programs

Label: Congress
Description: U.S. Congress - legislative branch oversight and environmental legislation

Label: Defense
Description: U.S. Department of Defense - manages environmental programs on military installations

Label: Energy
Description: U.S. Department of Energy - oversees energy production and nuclear facility environmental programs

Label: Health and Human Services
Description: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services - manages health and environmental safety programs

Label: Homeland Security
Description: U.S. Department of Homeland Security - coordinates security-related environmental programs

Label: Housing and Urban Development
Description: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development - manages urban environmental and housing programs

Label: Interior
Description: U.S. Department of the Interior - manages natural resources and public lands

Label: Judicial
Description: U.S. Judicial Branch - federal courts with jurisdiction over environmental law

Label: Justice
Description: U.S. Department of Justice - enforces environmental laws and regulations

Label: Labor
Description: U.S. Department of Labor - oversees workplace safety and health programs

Label: State
Description: U.S. Department of State - coordinates international environmental agreements

Label: Transportation
Description: U.S. Department of Transportation - regulates transportation-related environmental impacts

Label: Treasury
Description: U.S. Department of the Treasury - manages financial aspects of environmental programs

Label: Veterans Affairs
Description: U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs - manages environmental programs at VA facilities

Label: AIR PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT REGULATE OR MONITOR AIR EMISSIONS FROM AREA, STATIONARY, AND MOBILE SOURCES, AS REQUIRED BY THE CLEAN AIR ACT

Label: ANIMAL OPERATIONS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS RELATED TO ANIMAL OPERATIONS E.G LIVESTOCK WASTE CONTROL

Label: ASSISTANCE AND SUPPORT PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT PROVIDE ASSISTANCE TO THE REGULATED COMMUNITY AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC (E.G., ENVIRONMENTAL GRANTS, OUTREACH ACTIVITIES) OR ACTIVITIES THAT PROVIDE SUPPORT ACROSS ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS.

Label: CHEMICAL RELEASE PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT REGULATE OR MONITOR CHEMICALS RELEASED TO THE ENVIRONMENT (E.G., TOXIC RELEASE INVENTORY, RELEASE ASSESSMENTS).

Label: CHEMICAL STORAGE PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT REGULATE OR MONITOR THE STORAGE OF CHEMICALS (E.G., RISK MANAGEMENT PROGRAM, SUPERFUND AMENDMENTS AND REAUTHORIZATION ACT (SARA) TITLE III PROGRAM).

Label: COASTAL AND OCEAN PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF COASTAL AND MARINE ECOSYSTEMS AND PROTECT BEACHES, COAST, AND OCEAN RESOURCES FROM POLLUTION.

Label: Compliance Interest
Description: Environmental interest classification for compliance-related activities and records

Label: Compliance Record
Description: A record documenting compliance status and history for a facility

Label: Compliance System
Description: Information system for tracking facility compliance with environmental regulations

Label: DRINKING WATER PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT PROTECT THE QUALITY OF DRINKING WATER IN THE UNITED STATES, AS REQUIRED BY THE SAFE DRINKING WATER ACT.

Label: EPA PFAS Facility
Description: Facility identified as potentially handling PFAS in EPA PFAS Analytic tools based on industry.

Label: ECOLOGY OPERATIONS
Description: PROGRAMS THAT CONCENTRATE ON ECOLOGICAL SYSTEMS SUCH AS FOREST AND TREE EXPERTISE

Label: ELECTRONIC PERMIT SYSTEM
Description: ELECTRONIC PERMIT SYSTEM

Label: Enforcement or Compliance record
Description: A record that tracks a specific legal, corrective or assistance action taken against a facility

Label: Enforcement Interest
Description: Environmental interest classification for enforcement-related activities

Label: Enforcement System
Description: Information system for tracking environmental enforcement actions

Label: Enforcement Tracking Record
Description: A record tracking enforcement actions and their outcomes

Label: Environmental Interest By Program
Description: Classification of environmental interests organized by regulatory program type

Label: Environmental Interest By Record Type
Description: Interest classification based on the main subject of the record and what type of activity or entity it identifies.

Label: Environmental Interest Type
Description: The environmental permit or regulatory program type that applies to the facility site

Label: FRS Facility
Description: Facility from EPA Facility Registry Service

Label: FACILITY/SITE IDENTIFICATION
Description: INCLUDES SYSTEMS THAT MAINTAIN BASIC IDENTIFICATION INFORMATION ABOUT FACILITIES/SITES AND LINKAGES TO ENVIRONMENTAL PERMITS AND PROGRAMS AT THE STATE, TRIBAL AND NATIONAL LEVEL.

Label: Facility Type
Description: Type of Facility as defined by EPA FRS facility type controlled vocabulary

Label: Grant System
Description: Information system for tracking environmental grants and funding

Label: GROUND WATER PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO PROTECT GROUND WATER (E.G., UNDERGROUND INJECTION CONTROL (UIC),  MINERAL EXPLORATION).

Label: HAZARDOUS WASTE PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT REGULATE HAZARDOUS WASTE, INCLUDING THE GENERATION, TRANSPORTATION, TREATMENT, STORAGE, AND DISPOSAL OF HAZARDOUS WASTE, AS REQUIRED BY THE RESOURCE CONSERVATION AND RECOVERY ACT (RCRA).

Label: HEALTH AND SAFETY PROGRAMS
Description: PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO REDUCE HAZARDS AND PREVENT INJURIES, ILLNESSES AND DEATHS IN THE WORKPLACE.

Label: Legacy System
Description: Older information system maintained for historical environmental data

Label: LEGAL/ENFORCEMENT ACTIVITIES
Description: LEGAL OR ENFORCEMENT ACTIVITIES IN SUPPORT OF OTHER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS.

Label: Monitoring Record
Description: A record that monitors a facility on an ongoing basis

Label: Permit Interest
Description: Environmental Interests that create records that are permits or licenses

Label: Permit or license record
Description: A record that tracks a permit or license awarded to the facility

Label: Permit System
Description: Information system for managing environmental permits and licenses

Label: PESTICIDES PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT MONITOR BUSINESSES, GOVERNMENT AGENCIES, AND INDIVIDUALS THAT HANDLE, STORE, SELL, AND/OR APPLY PESITICIDES.

Label: Program Information System
Description: An Information System maintained for an environmental program

Label: Project Record
Description: A record documenting an environmental project or initiative

Label: Project System
Description: Information system for tracking environmental projects

Label: RADIATION PROTECTION PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO PROTECT PEOPLE AND THE ENVIRONMENT FROM HARMFUL EXPOSURE TO RADIATION

Label: Facility Record
Description: A record in an environmental program information system about a facility or site

Label: Registration Record
Description: A record documenting facility registration with an environmental program

Label: Registry Interest
Description: Environmental interest classification for facility registry and identification

Label: Registry System
Description: Information system for maintaining facility identification and basic information

Label: REMEDIATION AND REDEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS AIMED AT CLEANING UP AND/OR REDEVELOPING UNCONTROLLED OR ABANDONED PLACES WHERE HAZARDOUS WASTE MAY BE LOCATED POSSIBLY AFFECTING LOCAL ECOSYSTEMS OR PEOPLE.

Label: Reporting Interest
Description: Environmental interest classification for reporting requirements

Label: Reporting Record
Description: A record documenting reported environmental data or information

Label: Reporting System
Description: Information system for collecting and managing environmental reports

Label: Risk Interest
Description: Environmental interest classification for risk assessment and management

Label: Risk Plan Record
Description: A record documenting risk management or prevention plans for a facility

Label: Site Interest
Description: Environmental interest classification for site-level monitoring and assessment

Label: Site Record
Description: A record that monitors a site, beyond specific ownership of one organization and their activities, e.g. superfund site, air monitoring site

Label: Site System
Description: Information system for tracking environmental sites and their characteristics

Label: SOLID WASTE PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT REGULATE SOLID WASTES (E.G., COMPOST SITES, LANDFILLS, TRANSFER STATIONS).

Label: State System
Description: State-level information system for environmental program management

Label: State Tracking Record
Description: A record maintained by state environmental agencies

Label: Station System
Description: Information system for environmental monitoring stations

Label: Facility Supplemental Record
Description: Supplemental Record that relates to a facility but primarily identifies something other than the facility itself (e.g. permit, license, incident, enforcement action records)

Label: Tribal System
Description: Tribal government information system for environmental program management

Label: Tribal Tracking Record
Description: A record maintained by tribal environmental agencies

Label: UNDERGROUND STORAGE TANK PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO REDUCE THE CHANCE OF RELEASES FROM UNDERGROUND STORAGE TANKS (USTS), DETECT LEAKS AND SPILLS WHEN THEY DO OCCUR, AND SECURE PROMPT CLEANUP

Label: WASTE WATER PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT REGULATE DISCHARGES OF POLLUTANTS TO WATERS OF THE UNITED STATES, AS REQUIRED BY THE CLEAN WATER ACT.

Label: WATER RESOURCES PROGRAMS
Description: ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS THAT MANAGE WATER RESOURCES TO MEET THE NEEDS OF THE NATURAL ENVIRONMENT AND HUMAN COMMUNITIES, INCLUDING WATERSHED MANAGEMENT, STREAM FLOWS, WATER RIGHTS, WELL DRILLING, USE OF WATER SUPPLIES, AND DAM SAFETY.

Label: from System
Description: Links a record to the information system it originated from

Label: in program type
Description: Links a facility to the environmental program types or interest classifications that apply to it

Label: has FRS Id
Description: has Identifier in EPA Facility Registry Service

Label: has monitoring record
Description: Links a facility to records that monitor it on an ongoing basis

Label: has  record
Description: Links a facility to any type of environmental record associated with it

Label: has supplemental record
Description: Links a facility to supplemental records that provide additional information

Label: of facility type
Description: Links a facility to its type classification in the EPA FRS controlled vocabulary

Label: of program category
Description: Links an environmental interest to its classification category

Label: of Primary Industry
Description: Links a facility to its primary industry classification using NAICS codes

Label: of Secondary Industry
Description: Links a facility to its secondary industry classification using NAICS codes

Label: part Of
Description: Indicates hierarchical relationship - this entity is part of another entity

Label: replaced By
Description: Indicates this entity has been superseded or replaced by another entity

Label: Facility
Description: Any physical building, building complex or site (e.g. an airstrip, a mine, or superfund site) at which a commercial or institutional activity occurs.

Label: Industry
Description: A distinct group of productive or profit-making enterprises.

Label: Organization
Description: An organized entity such as a company, government agency, or institution that owns or operates facilities

Label: has Facility
Description: Links an organization to facilities it owns or operates

Label: of industry
Description: A relation between an entity and the industry it is classified under

Label: of Year
Description: A relation between an industry code and the schema year it belongs to.

Label: owned By
Description: Links a facility to the organization that owns or operates it

Label: same code
Description: Links two industry codes that have the same meaning across different NAICS schema versions

Label: subcode of
Description: A hierarchical relation between an industry and its parent industry

Label: year deprecated
Description: A relation between an industry code and the schema year it was deprecated and removed as a industry code with the same meaning.

Label: NAICS Industry
Description: North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) industry code - the most detailed level of industry classification (6 digits)

Label: NAICS Industry Code
Description: A NAICS code that identifies a specific industry category at any level of the classification hierarchy

Label: NAICS Industry Group
Description: NAICS industry group - an intermediate aggregation of industries (4 digits)

Label: NAICS Industry Sector
Description: NAICS sector - the highest level of industry aggregation (2 digits)

Label: NAICS Industry Subsector
Description: NAICS subsector - a subdivision of sectors into more specific industry categories (3 digits)
